snippet: Months after U.S. diplomats brokered a deal to allow 11 Americans to leave Egypt without standing trial, an Egyptian-American activist also charged was detained as he returned to proclaim his innocence.
abstract: Months after U.S. diplomats brokered a deal to allow 11 Americans to leave Egypt without standing trial, an Egyptian-American activist also charged was detained as he returned to proclaim his innocence.

headline.main: Egyptian-American Activist Returns to Cairo to Stand Trial for Democracy Promotion
